name: Agicent Technologies
tag_list: software-development-outsourcing, offshore-software-development, dedicated-development-team, mobile-apps-development, iphone-application-development-company, android-app-development-company, business-intelligence-consulting, scada-software-development, em
overview:
Agicent Technologies is a global software consulting & development services company based out at New Delhi area, India with a sales & delivery office in NJ, USA.

Agicent is a small but focussed team of highly experienced technology and business domain experts (average years of experience/ person is 7 years), and they primarily focus to cater the needs of fastest growing market domains of Mobile Apps (iPhone Apps/ iOS, Android, and Windows Mobile primarily), Telecom/ VAS, Location based services/ Telemetry, and SCADA.

Besides this, they are also into Business Intelligence consulting, Web 2.0 development, and BPM solutions.

Agicent is a team of around 25 technology professionals, and most of the development team works from their own development center in Noida (New Delhi area), India and rest are located at their customer premises in the US. To better engage with their US customers, Agicent is having a Sales & Delivery office in NJ, USA.

Agicent is expanding their presence across more areas in the US, and Europe.
